effects.name: Thorns
effects.description: 18 Nature damage to attackers when hit

effects.name: Gift of the Wild
effects.description: Increases armor by 285, all attributes by 12 and all resistances by 20

effects.name: Innervate
effects.description: Increases the target's Spirit based mana regeneration by 400% and allows full mana regeneration while casting

effects.name: Faerie Fire
effects.description: Decreases the armor of the target by 485. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible

effects.name: Cyclone
effects.description: Tosses the enemy target into the air, preventing all action but making them invulnerable for up to 6 seconds. Only one target can be affected by your Cyclone at a time

effects.name: Entangling Roots
effects.description: Roots the target in place for 27 seconds. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Only useable outdoors

effects.name: Hibernate
effects.description: Forces the enemy target to sleep for up to 40 seconds. Any damage will awaken the target. Only one target can be forced to hibernate at a time. Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin

effects.name: Soothe Animal
effects.description: Soothes the target beast, reducing the range at which it will attack you by 10 yards. Only affects Beast targets level 70 or lower. Lasts 15 seconds

effects.name: Tranquility
effects.description: Heals up to 5 injured allies within your party or raid group for 1097 every 2 seconds seconds for 8 seconds. Druid must channel to maintain the spell
